name: New Soup 64
overview:
Explore a wonderful world full of new soup in a 6 star mini hack!
Go through lands you've never seen before such as: Grass land, Desert land, Water land... and more!

The second half of the hack's lands have their inspiration taken from the previous land so there is no end to the excitement!

Now what are you waiting for??? Go to the Soupermarket and get yourself some New Soup!
